title: Life's a Glitch with Julien Bam
overview: Youtube icon and influencer Julien Bam wakes up one morning in what seems to be his own body... only everything is different. Along with his buddy Joon Kim, he has travelled to a parallel dimension where nothing is what it seems. In a quest to get back, he takes part in an MMA fight, drug trials, rap videos, LARPing, you name it - before he is drawn to a mysterious 5G mast.
